  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112715</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112715</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spoznavajmo značilnosti glasbe</string>
            <string language="en">Music characteristics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikeigenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques de musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características da música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά μουσικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de la música</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Skozi pesem A. Pesek: Prislužimo si kokljo, račko in gosko spoznajmo naraščujočo pesem in izvajajmo vedno hitrejši tempo v glasbi.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching about music characteristics by analyzing song \"Prislužimo si kokljo, račko in gosko\" by A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">značilnost</string>
            <string language="en">characteristic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pesem</string>
            <string language="en">song</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">a. pesek</string>
            <string language="en">a. pesek</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht über Musikeigenschaften durch das 
Analysieren von von Lied \"Prislu?imo Silikon kokljo, ra?ko im gosko 
\" durch A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement au sujet des caractéristiques de 
musique en analysant le kokljo de silicium de \"Prislu?imo de chanson,
ra?ko dans le gosko \" par A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensino sobre características da música 
analisando o kokljo do silicone do \"Prislu?imo da canção, ra?ko no 
gosko \" por A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnamento circa le caratteristiche di musica 
analizzando kokljo del silicone di \"Prislu?imo di canzone, ra?ko in 
gosko \" da A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλικός για τα χαρακτηριστικά μουσικής με την 
ανάλυση του kokljo Si τραγουδιού \"Prislu?imo, ra?ko στο
gosko \" από Α. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza sobre características de la música 
analizando el kokljo del silicio del \"Prislu?imo de la canción, 
ra?ko en gosko \" por A. Pesek.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">charakteristisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">a. pesek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">caractéristique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chanson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pesek de a.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">característico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesek do a.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratteristico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pesek del a.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηριστικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">α. pesek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">característico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">canción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pesek del a.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
